title: A review on synthesis of MOF-derived carbon composites: innovations in electrochemical, environmental and electrocatalytic technologies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27575-27607
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05183A, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sehar Shahzadi, Mariam Akhtar, Muhammad Arshad, Muhammad Hammad Ijaz, Muhammad Ramzan Saeed Ashraf Janjua
Carbon composites derived from Metal–Organic Frameworks (MOFs) have shown great promise as multipurpose materials for a range of electrochemical and environmental applications.
